cause.description:
HIS (Haitian Interdenominational Shelter) Home For Children is an interdenominational Christian ministry that was developed to care for orphaned and abandoned children in Haiti. Hal and Chris Nungester founded the non-profit organization in 1999, and minister under the leadership of a Board of Directors comprised of Christian leaders from West Central Ohio and Northeastern New York. HIS Home For Children is funded entirely through charitable contributions. Website: http://www.hishomeforchildren.com/ US Office Address (to which donation checks may be mailed): HIS Home For Children 3172 W Breese Rd Lima, OH 45806
1. Abandoned children in Haiti not only need food and shelter, but also the love of Jesus Christ in their lives.
2. All children should be loved and cared for.
3. James 1:27 (look it up; it won't fit in this box!)
cause.mission: To provide a home, education, and the love of Christ to, as well as aid in the adoption process of, orphaned and/or abandoned Haitian children.
cause.name: H.I.S. Home For Children
